name: Food Court Fever: Super Chef Restaurant Scramble
name_original: Food Court Fever: Super Chef Restaurant Scramble
description:
Join the almost 2 million people who have downloaded and played Food Court Fever! You get to cook delicious and tasty meals in this FREE addictive time-management game!

Customer Reviews:
- “I definitely enjoy this game. My daughter loves it too!” (SWiTcH8909)
- “It's really fun to play in your free time!!!!! Love it!!!!!” (JackieMcCarthyIsBæ).

Learn the recipes, get to know your customers, and practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Decorate your restaurant and upgrade your skills to keep your customers happy - just like in real life! And don’t be fooled... the game starts off simple enough but will quickly challenge you. See how many different restaurants you can open and how many levels you can complete! Enjoy the mini-games too! Have fun cooking!

HOW TO PLAY:
Your goal is to earn a target amount of money in the given time in order to clear the level. Start by tapping the customer and giving them a menu, take their orders, prepare their food by using different ingredients. Drag food or drink directly to the customer and collect your money. Try and be as quick as possible in preparing food or serving it to customers because they can be angry and annoying, they might even leave your shop if you take too long.

WHY THIS GAME ROCKS:
* Tons of food recipes to cook using many ingredients
* 70 challenging levels to complete
* Unlock new ingredients and customers
* Manage and decorate your own restaurants
* Mini-Games!
* Test your time management skills
* Serve quirky, friendly and crazy customers
